description: Patch files for open PR branches on google/fonts (felipesanches fork)

pr.title: Arsenal: add buildVariable: false to config.yaml
Move inline links to final links paragraph in 17 designer bios
Add missing target="_blank" to links in 221 designer bios
Fix broken repository_url in 6 METADATA.pb files
Raleway: fix incorrect source paths in config.yaml

restore_instructions:
To restore these branches on a fresh google/fonts clone:

1. Clone google/fonts:
   git clone https://github.com/google/fonts.git /mnt/shared/google/fonts
   cd /mnt/shared/google/fonts

2. Add the fork remote:
   git remote add felipesanches https://github.com/felipesanches/fonts.git

3. For each branch, create it and apply patches:
   git checkout -b <branch-name> origin/main
   git am data/gfonts_branch_patches/<branch-name>/*.patch

   If patches don't apply cleanly (main has moved forward), try:
   git checkout -b <branch-name> <base_commit>
   git am data/gfonts_branch_patches/<branch-name>/*.patch

   Or fetch from the fork (branches are still pushed there):
   git fetch felipesanches <branch-name>
   git checkout -b <branch-name> felipesanches/<branch-name>

4. Push updated branches to the fork if needed:
   git push felipesanches <branch-name>
